name: Watcher's Void
short_description: In this dark void, the only light comes from the multiple doors in the room. The room pulsates with some strange energy.
long_description: It appears as though you are standing in a dark void. The room pulsates with some strange energy, and the only light comes from the single window and the multiple doors in the room. You feel vaguely unsettled.

oak door.description: The wooden door is cracked with age.

sealed door.description: The window at the top of the door is too high to see much other than the flickering of firelight on a bricked ceiling. The door has no discernible handle or keyhole.

broken window.description: Through the broken glass, the view seems to change abruptly with every passing minute. Occasionally you'll catch a glimpse of a landscape filled with otherworldly creatures. Other times, it seems to show a village somewhere. You wonder if this room is in multiple places at once.
